question: Your parents will be celebrating their 40th anniversary next month. You are planning a big celebration, but you are not sure how to make the occasion really memorable.Write to a friend, who is a professional event planner. In your letter:explain why the occasion is specialask for his/her assistanceset up a time to meet at your friend's convenience to discuss your plans
text: How are you? I hope you're fine and still in good health. Next month my parents will celebrate their 40th anniversary and I want to make it a memorable one for them. I'm writing this letter to ask for your help on this matter as you have been an event organizer for years.

All throughout the years of their marriage, struggles and challenges came their way, but they surpassed them because they solve them together. Reaching 40 years is an achievement for every married couple out there.
I don't have talents in this field and I might mess it up. In terms of experience, you're the right person for the job, with your skills and expertise, the event will be a success.
Please inform me of the time and date you will be available, in order to discuss the things we should do. My contact details are still the same so you can reach me there in case you have questions.
I'll wait for your reply at the soonest. Hope to see you soon.
